Title: Provides mental telehealth services to children, adolescents, and young adults
Summary: Establishes a youth mental telehealth services program to facilitate access to mental health services, including substance use disorder services, for youth to respond to identified mental health needs.
LawCode: Amd ยง5.05, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to providing mental telehealth services to children, adolescents, and young adults
